title: Sample, ca. 1952
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19 x 18.5 cm (7 1/2 x 7 5/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Plain weave non-repeating plaid with paired warps. Warp is a variety of yarns in a non-repeating sequence including pink chenille, various pink plied yarns, pink smooth yarns, green boucle, green smooth yarn and metallic braided over a central core. Weft has a variety of yarns in a repeating sequence including green boucle, pink metallic braid, pink plied yarn, pink chenille, pink smooth yarn, copper metallic braided over a central core, and yellow novelty yarn with tufts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1952.
ca. 1952. Medium: synthetic
Technique: plain weave. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-86.
